response:
Spigot is a type of server software for Minecraft Java Edition. It allows you to run plugins on the server, and ProjectKorra requires Spigot in order to run.

There are a few types of Spigot. We recommend Paper Spigot, as it is Spigot but patches for optimization (so its faster!). Purpur is another great option, as it has a lot of fun configuration options while maintaining the optimization of paper.
